solution_line_template: There are {num_special_food_fish} fish who need the special food because {total_goldfish} x {special_food_percentage} = <<{total_goldfish}*{special_food_percentage}={num_special_food_fish}>>{num_special_food_fish}

These fish eat {total_special_food_oz_per_day} ounces a day because {num_special_food_fish} x {food_per_goldfish_oz} = <<{num_special_food_fish}*{food_per_goldfish_oz}={total_special_food_oz_per_day}>>{total_special_food_oz_per_day}
